description:
Putting all her faith in her own magic, Nanoha challenges Fate to a final battle. During the confusion, Fate attacks Nanoha with all her strength. Yuno and Alph watch on, while Amy watches over Chrono. And the final result of the battle between the two of them is...!
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Omoide wa Toki no Kanata na no
思い出は時の彼方なの
